src/components/search/GlobalSearchModal..description: GlobalSearchModal component uses Dialog from ui/dialog.tsx, useSearchStore for modal state, useGlobalSearch for search logic, and useSearchShortcut for Cmd/Ctrl+K keyboard shortcut. Features skeleton loading, empty state, initial state, query-too-short state, and result click navigation to /call/:id.

src/components/search/SearchResultItem.t.description: SearchResultItem now exports getResultRoute() utility function for generating navigation routes. Can be used by other components needing to navigate to search results. All result types (transcript, insight, quote) navigate to /call/:sourceCallId.
